name: Ldap_Query
author: Florian Perret @cyber_pescadito
description: Query your LDAP server to harvest informations about an user of your organization

configurationItems.name: LDAP_Server_Address
configurationItems.description: Should contain the protocol. Eg: ldaps://myldap.myorg.com

configurationItems.name: LDAP_Username
configurationItems.description: Usernae of the account that will be used to bind to LDAP server. The Account should have permissions to read ldap objects and attributes.

configurationItems.name: LDAP_Password
configurationItems.description: Password of the account used to bind to LDAP server.

configurationItems.name: base_DN
configurationItems.description: The base DN to use in your LDAP. Eg: dc=myorg,dc=com

configurationItems.name: Attributes
configurationItems.description: Specify here the attributes you want to harvest. Eg: mail
